item.title: Top 10! Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card
item.dc:creator: admin
item.category: Holiday Cards
Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card
item.description: Top 10! Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card
item.content:encoded:
Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card

Top 10! Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card – Holiday Cards This item is trending! Simple Script Photo Holiday Card good product Simple Script Photo Holiday Card See more about itThis design features a single cherished photo. Choose a treasured memory from the past year, a family portrait, a special moment, a snapshot of your pet, or a more casual selfie. This simple design is made to match any photo of your choice. Underneath the photo, you can personalize the "Happy Holidays" greeting and the year, all in elegant sans-serif capitals. Aligned to the right, your family name is presented in signature-style script handwriting, adding a warm and personal touch. As you flip the card, you’ll find an earthy boho brown background decorated with a delicate white pine pattern. Ideal for those who appreciate a modern and minimalist design that still radiates warmth. Matching items are available in the collection linked on this page. Feel free to message me with any questions – I’ll be happy to help! Note I cannot modify an existing order. Browse our store for more unique Christmas photo cards. Price:$1.83

Top 10! Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card Best Price :($1.83)

item.title: Top 5! Merry Christmas Retro Script Photo Holiday Card
item.dc:creator: admin
item.category: Holiday Cards
Merry Christmas Retro Script Photo Holiday Card
item.description: Top 5! Merry Christmas Retro Script Photo Holiday Card
item.content:encoded:
Merry Christmas Retro Script Photo Holiday Card

Top 5! Merry Christmas Retro Script Photo Holiday Card – Holiday Cards Merry Christmas Retro Script Photo Holiday Card quality over price Merry Christmas Retro Script Photo Holiday Card quality products**Personalized Minimalist Christmas Greeting Card**

Celebrate the festive season with a touch of personal elegance. Introducing our minimalist Christmas greeting card, designed exclusively for those who appreciate simplicity with a hint of nostalgia. On the front, showcase your cherished photo, creating a sentimental focal point. Above your image, the phrase "Merry Christmas" melds the contemporary aesthetics of a modern sans-serif font with the timeless grace of a retro script. To add that personal finishing touch, your name is inscribed below the photo, making every card uniquely yours. As you flip to the back, another photo of your choice adorns the card, coupled with your heartfelt personalized message. Make this Christmas memorable by sharing a piece of your heart with your loved ones. Order now and let your festive spirit shine through every card! Price:$1.97

item.title: Big Deals! Married & Merry Gold Arch Christmas Holiday Photo

Married & Merry Gold Arch Christmas Holiday Photo
item.description: Big Deals! Married & Merry Gold Arch Christmas Holiday Photo
item.content:encoded:
Married & Merry Gold Arch Christmas Holiday Photo

Big Deals! Married & Merry Gold Arch Christmas Holiday Photo – Holiday Cards Married & Merry Gold Arch Christmas Holiday Photo quality over price Married & Merry Gold Arch Christmas Holiday Photo Try to read more firstReplace with your photo inside the faux gold arch and send custom greeting cards to friends and family. An elegant card with a boho touch. The front of the card has "married + merry" in classic serif capitals, with your names below in a gold color to match the arch. Cards reverse to a second, full-bleed photo of your choice. Perfect for any newlywed couple to share some of their wedding photos this holiday season! We love holiday photo cards, as they make such a special keepsake for the year to come. These cards were made with customization in mind, and all aspects of this design (fonts, text size, colors, background, image, placement) can be edited, moved, or removed to suit your needs. Click on "Personalize this template" to edit the text and upload your own photographs. For more advanced modifications, simply scroll to "Click to customize further" and use the Zazzle design tool. Feel free to contact me if you need a hand with this design – I’ll be happy to help! Just note, that I can’t interfere with or modify an existing order. Browse the collections above or visit my store for more beautiful holiday photo cards! Wishing you a very merry Christmas and all the best for the new year! Price:$1.83
